segment.source: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: Configure the App-V Streaming Server for enhanced security through the registry.
segment.target: Configure the App-V Streaming Server for enhanced security through the registry.

segment.source: As with the App-V Management Server, a certificate must be correctly provisioned with the correct EKU identifier for Server Authentication before you complete the following post-installation procedure.
segment.target: As with the App-V Management Server, a certificate must be correctly provisioned with the correct EKU identifier for Server Authentication before you complete the following post-installation procedure.

segment.source: To configure Streaming Server security post-installation
segment.target: To configure Streaming Server security post-installation

segment.source: Create an MMC, add the Certificates snap-in, and select Local Machine certificate store.
segment.target: Create an MMC, add the Certificates snap-in, and select Local Machine certificate store.

segment.source: Open the Personal certificates for the computer, and open the certificate provisioned for App-V.
segment.target: Open the Personal certificates for the computer, and open the certificate provisioned for App-V.

segment.source: On the Details tab, scroll down to the thumbprint and copy the hash in the details pane.
segment.target: On the Details tab, scroll down to the thumbprint and copy the hash in the details pane.

segment.source: Open the registry editor, and navigate to .
segment.target: Open the registry editor, and navigate to .

segment.source: Edit the value, paste the thumbprint hash in the value field, and remove all spaces.
segment.target: Edit the value, paste the thumbprint hash in the value field, and remove all spaces.

segment.source: Click OK to accept the edit.
segment.target: Click OK to accept the edit.

segment.source: In the registry editor, navigate to .
segment.target: In the registry editor, navigate to .

segment.source: Create a new DWORD value named "322," and then enter the decimal value as 322 or the hexadecimal value as 142.
segment.target: Create a new DWORD value named "322," and then enter the decimal value as 322 or the hexadecimal value as 142.

segment.source: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
